title: Honda Motorcycle set to launch eScooters in 2024 befitting Indian market
description: Consumer sentiment in rural India, though, is yet to recover fully and sales in these markets have declined, Atsushi Ogata told ET. "However, we have seen some green shoots this festive season and expect both rural and urban centres to grow next fiscal."
